body.name: Dove Advanced Care Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick Lavender Fresh for helping your skin barrier repair after shaving 72 hour odor control and all day sweat protection for soft underarms 2.6 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: CARES & PROTECTS: Dove Advanced Care Lavender Fresh Antiperspirant Stick is the kind-to-skin antiperspirant deodorant for beautifully soft, resilient underarms
LONG-LASTING PROTECTION: Antiperspirant deodorant with 72 hour odor control and all-day underarm sweat protection
CARING FORMULA: Antiperspirant deodorant stick with innovative Pro Ceramide Technology
REPLENISHES SKIN: Antiperspirant that helps your skin barrier repair and improve from shaving
FRESH FRAGRANCE: Enriched with a fresh chamomile and soothing lavender scent
body.description: Step this way for beautifully soft, resilient underarms. Introducing Dove Advanced Care Lavender Fresh Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick, your after-shave care for underarms that helps your skin barrier repair with every use. If you love a lavender-scented deodorant, indulge in the calming aroma of this antiperspirant deodorant, which helps soothe and ground you throughout the day. Dove Advanced Care antiperspirant deodorant range features innovative Pro-Ceramide Technology that boosts ceramide levels in your skin, which are essential for maintaining a strong skin barrier. This increase of ceramides helps your skin barrier to repair and recover after shaving (especially as shaving can actually reduce ceramide levels in your skin). Using this kind-to-skin antiperspirant deodorant stick means your underarms can benefit from better skin care and some well-deserved TLC, without letting any shaving worries get in the way. Did you know that when you shave, ⅓ of what you remove is skin? Cue Dove Advanced Care Lavender Fresh Antiperspirant Stick, enriched with Pro-Ceramide Technology to help form a stronger skin barrier that can recover from shaving symptoms, like dryness and redness. With 72 hours of odor control, as well as all-day underarm sweat protection, it quickly dries on your skin, giving you silky-soft underarms with a lavender scent with every use Hold one arm above your head and use the other to apply your antiperspirant, gliding it on in light circles. Repeat under the other arm. Remember to wait a few minutes before applying your antiperspirant deodorant stick after shaving* – the formula works best on cool, dry skin. Don’t just reserve this antiperspirant deodorant stick for the daytime – you can apply it before you go to bed, too. Sleeping with antiperspirant on means the nourishing formula has more time to set and protect your underarms, so you can wake up feeling refreshed and uplifted.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 72h odor and all day wetness protection Dove knows that underarm skin needs kindness as well as protection. That’s why Dove Advanced Care gives you 72h odor and all day wetness protection, while also containing caring ingredients making it kind to your skin. Replenish your skin after every shave 1/3 of what you remove when you shave is skin. Dove Advanced Care with pro-ceramide technology replenishes you skin after every shave. For soft, resilient skin. Dove Lavender Fresh Deodorant is vegan Our Lavender Fresh is vegan and Dove is PETA approved, meaning we do not test on animals, anywhere in the world. Take a breath Stay cool, calm and collected from morning ‘till night with the soothing scent of chamomile, ylang ylang and lavender.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps Me Fresh
reviews.reviewText: The scent is perfectly faint, barely noticeable. The cap on the deodorant fits nice and tight. Most of all it keeps me feeling fresh all day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive skin, and I can't usually use scents. I had to try this. I've used Dove deoderant since I had to test drive it for marketing when it came. I even tried to switch to natural and came back to it. Nothing works like it and makes your armpits smooth etc. This scent is a tad strong at first. I'm a supersmeller, everything you smell I can smell 10x's more - at least, and this scent doesn't bother me. I usually use unscented everything because I can't stand how strong products are. I love this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My armpits were armpits before Dove. Now they are under arms ;)
reviews.reviewText: My skin loves this. Correction: my pits love this. I never noticed how dry my skin was but I suposse since I shave my armpits daily they get dry. I lotion with aveeno and then put this on right after the shower. It soothes my skin and I think the added lotion helps to keep them supple so I don't sweat as much from overcompensating dry skin.I tried to switch to one with less chemicals. It all burns and doesn't work. So right back to Dove I go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Dove is a nice deodorant and it has a nice texture and smell. It doesn't leave white spots under your arms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is good.
reviews.reviewText: Works great. Smells great. His is my favorite deodorant. Lavender is my favorite flower scent so it’s a win win. This is also moisturizing from what I’ve noticed. Also lavender is known to keep mosquitoes away and that was a primary reason I chose this scent (since my neighborhood has mosquitoes during the summer months)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deodorant I use only Dove now!
reviews.reviewText: Scent is pretty, I have sensitive skin and Dove deodorant doesn't give me a rash. Lasts longer than I thought it would.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can’t find this scent in stores
reviews.reviewText: I’m glad I found this on Amazon, I love the lavender smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Definitely doesn’t smell like lavender
reviews.reviewText: It’s smells more like baby powder to be honest, however it still lasts all day and keeps me from smelling like b.o. It also took a few weeks before they arrived.
Found it to be totally dried out making it impossible to apply. Not recommended.
